name: Hugging Face API Key
help: An API Key that gives access to Hugging Face

name: Labels of interest
help: Comma separated list of labels from "AudioSet" that will be be used to label the sample. When model returns any other label, the label for this sample in Edge Impulse will be set to "noise"

name: Window size (ms)
help: Size of the window for each classification

name: Multi-Label
help: Apply multilabel to original long sample if true (Only PRO and ENTERPRISE); Reupload classified splits if false

name: Enable "maybe" label
help: Intorduce a "maybe" label for samples that are not classified with high confidence for the labels of interest. This will mark up the regions in the large sample where to review manually.

name: "Maybe" threshold
help: Threshold after which the classification becomes "maybe"
